thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Twilio Reports Q1 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.04

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Twilio Reports Q1 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.04
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Twilio Inc:
* TWILIO ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.25 * Q1 REVENUE $129.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $116.6 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.07 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 TOTAL REVENUE $ 129.0 MILLION TO $ 131.0 MILLION * SEES Q2 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $ 0.06 TO $ 0.05
* SEES FULL YEAR TOTAL REVENUE $ 538.0 MILLION TO $ 544.0 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $ 0.10 TO $ 0.07
* SEES Q2 BASE REVENUE $ 122.0 MILLION TO $ 123.0 MILLION * SEES FULL YEAR BASE REVENUE $ 507.0 MILLION TO $ 510.0 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $123.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12, REVENUE VIEW $511.9 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
